tool_description: Verifies and extracts data from vendor-submitted documents including tax forms, certificates, licenses, and financial statements with automated validation checks.

document_urls.description: URLs or paths to uploaded documents

verification_level.description: Level of verification required (basic, standard, enhanced)

expiry_check.description: Whether to check document expiry dates

extract_data.description: Whether to extract key data from documents

max_file_size_mb.description: Maximum file size allowed in MB

require_digital_signature.description: Whether documents must have digital signatures

language.description: Expected document language for OCR processing

error_messages: Document format not supported: Use one of the acceptable formats specified in acceptable_formats parameter.
File size exceeded: Document size must not exceed max_file_size_mb limit.
Document expired: One or more documents have expired and need renewal.
OCR extraction failed: Unable to extract text from document - ensure document quality and format.
Missing digital signature: Document requires digital signature when require_digital_signature is true.
Verification level invalid: Use one of [basic, standard, enhanced].
Document type mismatch: Uploaded document doesn't match specified document type.
Vendor ID not found: Provided vendor_id does not exist in the system.
Document URL inaccessible: Cannot access one or more document URLs provided.
usage: Provide vendor_id, document_types, and document_urls arrays with matching indices. Optionally configure verification_level, file format restrictions, and validation rules. The tool will verify documents and extract relevant data.
